entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 7:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 10 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6 except minus 10 in low lying areas. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
